comments.content: oh, right! thanks. it's perfect for something.
and it was designed by margo chase.

Eww. I don't think it's even good enough for T-26. Looks   
like someone took parts of letters and mashed them   
together in a lame freeware grunge attempt (which means it   
might be hard to find). The 's' is just upside-down.

It's a T-26 alright. Pterra. I like it, personally. Reminds me of some of the type Margo Chase designs. You can buy it at MyFonts.com ( [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/pterra/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822103852/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/pterra/)).   
Best of luck.
